protein.specific_function: Regulates cellular polyamine homeostasis. Inhibits antizyme-dependent ornithine decarboxylase degradation by binding to antizyme

go_class.description: cellular amino acid and derivative metabolic process
cellular amino acid derivative metabolic process

reference.reference_text: Koguchi K, Kobayashi S, Hayashi T, Matsufuji S, Murakami Y, Hayashi S: Cloning and sequencing of a human cDNA encoding ornithine decarboxylase antizyme inhibitor. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1997 Sep 12;1353(3):209-16.
